@greeny_63 great to see you back on form! Well done today. Sumiyo and I wish you continued success as you head to the weekend. @MSkarpnord
At Delfina's Pizzeria in SF. This place rocks. (Can you believe Sumiyo just had a baby only 3 weeks ago?$ http://t.co/erz8JnDuVB

At the GS doCommerce event. Quote of the day from Mike Rubin: "As important as the web is to commerce, mobile is to the web."
#sergiogarcia time to man up and take responsibility for your comments. No place for racially insensitive remarks.
@SamuelLJackson right on. Remarkably insensitive and stupid.
RT @SamuelLJackson: Ohkaaay! Sergio's "Fried Chicken" comment. WTF?! Then, "Not Racist"? REALLY??!! STFU! Apology Not Accepted!
@elkpga Very classy. You've just lost another fan, bro.
@elkpga You're watching the PGA Tour Championship, not a NASCAR qualifying lap. No need for all the fire, or the hate. Let it go, bro.
@TigerWoods @TheSergioGarcia: Gentlemen, time to let the clubs do the talking.  Enough with the bromides. No stronger statement than winning
@JimmyConnors. Wonderful meeting you, JC. Thanks for being so gracious with your time. LMK if you ever need anything http://t.co/9YE5Nw42uI
Pleasure meeting the great @JimmyConnors. Highly articulate, wonderfully personable. A gentleman. Thanks, JC. Big fan http://t.co/hlmcPTg3v7
#2013gc another great qt from Gretzky: "the most talented are also the hardest working. The challenge is motivating teammates / colleagues"
#2013gc: question to W. Gretzcky: "what is like being you?"  Gretzcky: The good Lord blessed me. So it's pretty nice. I like it."  Love it!
Had the honor and pleasure of meeting former PM Tony Blair. A true statesman and friend of the US. #2013GC http://t.co/D4BFscK0rc
I only wish that I had more time. Luminaries of all the most important topics of today are here debating what is to come. Truly enlightening
#Milken has put together the standard for a thought leadership conference. Remarkable gathering of the leading lights of our generation.
@greeny_63 great to hear from you. Sorry to hear about your shoulder. Come visit us in SF when your back in action. Best to you and MS.
With Tony Blair! http://t.co/WccoTW20aZ
I just ran into none other than former British PM Tony Blair (and a nontrivial security entourage in tow).
@LaurenLyster And let's not forget that she's sharp and not so hard on the eyes!  Great meeting you.  Keep in touch!
Just had the pleasure of meeting @LaurenLyster.  She's a terrific journalist, highly personable and quite funny.  Lauren: you have a fan!
First day of the Milken Conference almost complete. Amazing event thus far. Highly provocative speakers. Too many patrons, however.
Does anyone else read more than one book at a time?  I can't tell if I'm being smart, am suffering from ADD or just being plain foolish.
I'm conducting an experiment on language using my own Tweets: check out http://t.co/YhiTj4HUB9 to assess personality of anyone who Tweets!
I'm reading the "Secret Life of Pronouns."  Fascinating book. Well worth reading. The science behind language analysis is mind-blowing. Wow!
Have just relocated to SF. Remarkable city. Extraordinary energy here. Can't wait for the family to join me. Miss them deeply.
So deeply grateful for all I have. I'm clearly blessed. One should never forget to take time and reflect, give thanks and always share.
Wonderful news: have just discovered that we have another baby boy on the way!  Looking for inspiration on names. Lots of love to share.
What a wild ride joining a startup has been. After 3 months there are 2 things that I've come to realize: as much to unlearn as learn anew.
Leaving for Milken Institute Conference in LA.  Give me a shout if about. Looking forward to learning what's tomorrow's news.
The Fastest Way To Lose BodyFat in (2)Weeks http://t.co/ZubxiVF2
Account has been hacked. Please disregard request to see a photo posted by me.

@MSkarpnord  We are all safe and sound. Thanks for asking. I'm in NYC this week, so I missed it. How are you?  When is your next tourney?
@greeny_63 great round today. Go low on Sunday. Doing well. Hope you and MS are well.
@greeny_63 Sweet playing. Keep it rolling this weekend.
@greeny_63 nice!!!!!
@ChrisPerez54: Luv your passion, but keep the faith about CLE. The Tribe have more fans than you realize. I follow the tribe fr Hong Kong.
@Brittany1golf best club in the NYC area. I'm biased, however, as I'm a member. Glad you liked the club.  Good luck the rest of the season.
@chambleebrandel just read your "My Shot" in GD. You're a lot more insightful and empathetic than I originally gave u credit. Nice piece.
"Wine is sunlight held together by water ..." Galileo
@greeny_63 Great finish in China. Looks like the game is rounding into form. Keep in rolling.
@greeny_63 sweet playing in China.  Good on ya mate. Love to see you win. Buy you and  @MSkarpnord dinner in HKG if you do! Keep it going.
@PaulAzinger: agree with your views about Tiger. His behavior at the Masters was pathetic as was his "apology." Keep calling it like u c it!
@McIlroyRory your swing is poetry in motion. Continue to kick a$$ in golf, but here's hoping that you stay all-world as a person. Big fan.
@MSkarpnord @greeny_63 I'm hoping your golf games stay hot as well!  Rock on.
@greeny_63 Great playing today. Sorry am not there. Keep it going. Hope that you and @MSkarpnord are enjoying KL.
@chambleebrandel: dude, what's with all the vitriol. Try to be constructive and less dogmatic. Easy to be critical from the stands.
@greeny_63 well played yesterday. Looks like the game is rounding into form. Good luck in KL. You and @MSkarpnord should have fun.
@greeny_63 @mskarpnord: Rock on. Will be cheering for you from Maui. You are due for another great round. S
@greeny_63 looking good, man. Sorry I will miss you guys next week in KL.  I've asked my man, Yow, to look after you and @MSkarpnord
@MSkarpnord: crazy strong winds!  @greeny_63 is still in the mix. Stay warm and good luck!
@greeny_63 keep it going!
@MSkarpnord you should join us in Maui. You and @greeny_63 are always welcome to visit. We have world class golf facilities there.
@MSkarpnord doing well. Only a few days until Maui. Cannot wait. When are you playing next?
@MSkarpnord: great run this week in Morocco. No doubt your next win is not far off. Well played. I'm sure @greeny_63 is proud. Best. S
@MSkarpnord: awesome work yesterday. Great to see all the hard work pay off.
@MSkarpnord: nice playing today. Keep it going!
@MSkarpnord you must be tired. Headed to BKG for work. Two weeks until Maui. You going to join us at Kapalua?
@MSkarpnord how will you be there?  Will be in BGK this Wed and Thursday.
@StephanieWei I'm seeing Gary Planos in HKG next week. Will send him your regards. An enjoying you reporting.
@HunterMahan get a haircut and a shave. Better yet, get Rickey Fowler to do the same. Love your game, however.
@MSkarpnord we will be at Kapalua March 29 - April 6. Would love to have you join.
@MSkarpnord Hi. Am doing well. When is your next event?  Greeny told me you guys won't be able to join us in Maui this time.  Come visit.
@greeny_63 Tried the Titleist gear. AP2s, 910 D2 driver, and SM4 wedges. One word to describe them: pure. Thanks for the recommendation.

@greeny_63 @mskarpnord 
No worries. You guys have a lifetime invitation to visit us in HKG or at Kapalua. Play well. We are cheering for u.
@greeny_63 @MSkarpnord We've booked our Easter holiday at Kapalua. We will be there March 29 - April 6, then HNL the 7 - 8. Come visit us.
@greeny_63 ordered the D3 and the AP2s. Should have them soon. The pros at Clearwater Bay GC in HKG hooked me up. They are from Melbourne!
@greeny_63: just ordered a set of Titleist woods and irons. You're right about Titleist gear being the best.
https://t.co/Z55INAjm
Go #Tebow. #TomBrady is just too soft. See photo. http://t.co/WVg2Y7QJ
@JasonGore59 saw you #kapalua. You deserve not only to be in the NTO, but back in Maui at the TOC. I'm all for #NTO4GORE!
@HollySondersGC @gcmorningdrive did you know it is the only place in the US that grows coffee?  Factoid 2: Hawaii covers the most sq miles
Let the #pgatour season begin. #kapalua, baby. No better views in golf. http://t.co/rsKdslsu
@elkpga Lesnar is back from a big loss and from surgery. He's massive and a good wrestler, but one dimensional. Striking / chin are weak
@elk Lesnar is coming back from a big loss and from surgery. He's massive and a good wrestler, but one dimensional. Striking / chin are weak
@StephanieWei give my regards to Gary Planos. Enjoy your time at Maui. Be sure to also see my man, Jerry King, the best teaching pro in HI.
@DanHicksNBC. Love your work. Like you, I'm also a member at Bayonne GC. Would love to play a round with you in 2012.  Happy new year.
@greeny_63 a merry Christmas and happy new year to you. All the best to you and your family in 2012.  Visit us soon. http://t.co/I7OAsaFO
@TheRealBuzz: hi. Am a huge fan of yours. How can I get an autograph?
@MSkarpnord way to fight back and make the cut. Great day for you and @greeny_63!
@greeny_63 outstanding. Looking forward to watching you play. Knock 'em dead today. As we say in the States: "you the man!"
@greeny_63 good luck today at the AM. Will be rooting for you.
@MSkarpnord good luck in Dubai.  Show the tour who the real #1 ladies golfer is from Norway!
Watching the Shark Shootout. Love #RickieFowlerPGA's game. Hate the hair. Get a haircut. Wait 'till you win a major to go  all Zach Efron.
@StephanieWei I have a scoop for you
@MSkarpnord @greeny_63 See you on the first tee some day. http://t.co/alw3APj4
@MSkarpnord @greeny_63 or in Hawaii. You have a lifetime invitation.
Props to our new friends @greeny_63 and @MSkarpnord. Hope you had a wonderful time in HKG. We miss you already.
@greeny_63 hey, man. I'm now follower number 11!
@Graeme_McDowell business lounge. ANA has an awesome draft beer machine.
@elkpga you can't say you're "old school" if you're posting tweets! Love the notes, man. Keep em flowing.
@HankDHaney am hitting blocks and pulls with my wedges. Frustrating for a 2 handicap. Any suggestions?
@elkpga funniest tweet of the week.
@Keegan_Bradley gutsiest comeback from a devastating triple. Way to go. Way to go.
Does anyone else think that Tiger firing his friend and caddie, Steve Williams, is a bit harsh?  No one was more loyal to Tiger than Steve.
@natalie_gulbis that looks more like bait than the catch.
@Graeme_McDowell too close to call.
@StuartAppleby no doubt that would be a major procedure. What a jackass.
@TheChristinaKim and you're right. Bubba is a douche.
@TheChristinaKim look us up if ever in Maui. We are members of Kapalua. Best of luck the rest of the season.
@TheChristinaKim Stay just the way you are, sister. Your fans appreciate your honesty an lack of pretense. Fellow KAs are proud of you.
@Graeme_McDowell also gave a stirring account of his four of Paris. "what's that big tower called again?" no joke
@Graeme_McDowell Bubba whined about missing the cut. Blamed the fans for being rude. Bubba also gave a shocker of a press conference.
#shaqname how about: Sunset Slam
@natalie_gulbis Super club.  I heard from my fellow members and our staff that they enjoyed having you.  Good luck the rest of the season.
@hilarybreathes.  Great job with the tweets.  Pithy, punchy and oh so funny.  Well done.
@BradFaxon huge fan.
Big weekend at Turnberry.  Watson has found his form of years ago.  Sorry, Tiger, but the weekend is about another TW: Tom Watson, that is.
Duval played great at the US Open.  Great to see him back in the mix.  True heart of a champion.
Glad to see David Duval make the cut at the Memorial.  Saw a shot of him on 18.  Man has he put on some weight.  Hardly looks like himself.
Am trying to beat a pretty nasty cold, but proving difficult.  Too much work and stress as of late.  Have to take better care of myself.
Big win for Sabbatini today.  For once he let his clubs do all the talking.  Great win.
@TheAnnaRawson Hope to see you breakthrough this season.  The LPGA in need of a real boost.  Keep the Porsche under the speed limit!
Am curious if Adam Scott remains serious about his game.  He looks out of it and his waistline is starting to bulge . does he have the fire?
Looks like TW is lost with his swing.  He is in that awkward transition phase between the old and new swing.  Could be rough summer for him
The Players week.  Am wondering if Tiger will find his swing this week.  He might be better off leaving the driver in the bag.
Work, work and more work.  Alas, not on my swing!  Need to rebalance in the days ahead.
@PGA_JohnDaly Glad to hear that u r back!  I think you have at least 1 major win left in u.  Lots of fans wish you all the best.  Rock on JD
Just finished another 20 hr work day reviewing spreadsheets and  presentation materials.  Yes, my life is as glamorous as a rock star!
Am getting ready to have our good buddy, J Jamison over for dinner and drinks.  Great to hang with old friends.
Watching this playoff at the Masters is like looking at a train wreck in slow motion.  Perry, step up and make this part putt!
Kenny Perry  just does not want to take control of the Masters.  Chunk hook from the middle of the fairway.  Now he`s short sided.  Tough.
Chad Campbell must be in pain.  Missed a makeable short putt for par.  He made bogey from the middle of the fairway, 150 yards out.  Ouch!
I think all three players are going down hole 10 for the second hole of the Masters Playoff.
Clutch pitch by the old man, Kenny P.
Perry, Cabrera, and Campbell all miss the green in the playoff.  Where is Tiger when you need him?  No one wants to win this.  Painful 2 c.
Masters heading to sudden death playoff.  The members put the excitement back into the event.  Look for Perry to birdie 18 to win.
@hattser http://twitpic.com/372jk - Billy Big?
@hattser http://twitpic.com/37b99 - lovely story
@CC_Sabathia: Great game against KC.  Good to see you take charge with that wicked fastball.  Good luck w. next start. The Tribe misses you.
@hattser Lovely story!
Working with Hatty to get his Tweetdeck up and running. (May take a while!)
@jeremiahjamison http://twitpic.com/361xd - I am, Tiger Woods.
@hattser Get Rachel in the iPhone.  Dont be a miserly old fart.
Phil and Tiger smackdown on Easter Sunday.  Phil is a cream puff.  Both a re too far back to make a run at the leaders - but you never know!
Gearing up for an exciting weekend of Masters coverage.  Look for El Tigre to make a charge this weekend.  Phil, Sergio and Tiger in play!
@stewartcink Solid round.  You looked good the entire day.  If your putter gets hot: look out.  Good luck in round 2.  Play well: be strong
Amazing scoring at the 1st round of the Masters.  The Shark will make the cut as will Larry Mize.  Lefty, in my view, is doubtful.  Go Cink.
Big questions at this years Masters: Can the Shark find the form of old?  How will the teenagers fare?  Tiger vs. Phil?  Paddy Slam anyone?
@Coco_Crisp Boston needs you.  Get some rest between games, bro.
Tiger is paired with Cink and JM Singh at the Masters.  Tiger has not broken par in the first round in six year.  If he does, he wins.
Ok.  I`m all for the environment, but why can`t someone make recycled toilet paper that doesn`t chafe?
@stewartcink http://twitpic.com/2xkyq - Rock on, Stewart.  Rock on.  Hoping you get that long putter of yours heated up this week.
Masters week.  Spring has officially arrived.  Phil and Tiger, as always, are favorites.  I think Cink and Ogilvy are the ones to beat.
@jeremiahjamison JJ when are you headed to Tokyo?
Busy week of work ahead, but the best days of sports as well.  The final four followed by the Masters.  Spring has officially arrived.
@CoachJoeyD Good luck at a Augusta.  You have done a remarkable job with P. Perez.  Looks like Vijay could use your services again.
Have a hard week of work ahead, but a great Sunday with the family.  Great dinner and quality cigar and am ready to hit the ground running.
@CC_Sabathia You were the man in Cleveland.  Best of luck with the Yanks.  They need you even more than the Tribe.
We are getting ready to celebrate the 100 day birthday of our son.  What a cute little munchkin.
@stewartcink You're my pick for the Masters.  No carbs, buddy.
@barefoot_exec: You'd like Tokyo this time of year with the cherry blossoms in bloom.  The trees look like they are topped with pink snow.
@stewartcink: good luck at the Masters, man.  Hope you play well.
Sure, the dudes who founded Google are considered to be smart. For my money, the person would invented the Diaper Genie is a true genius.
I think it's lame when a celeb says he / she is on Twitter, but instead uses a "ghost" writer.  Lame. Lame. Lame.
Glad to see Stewart Cink Twittering away.  He is long overdue for that first major.  Look for him to do well at the Masters.
Loved walking around Tokyo.  Cherry blossoms in full bloom.  Had our son, JT, with us.  He loved being out in the sunshine.  Life is good.
Wondering if we are seeing a new wave of Macarthyism emerge.
Playing with JT.  The kid just melts my heart.
Never would have thought that I would be happy getting up at 3 am to change a diaper.  Just love being a dad.
